hotels.address: Rua Dr. Alfredo Magalhães, 0, União de Freguesias do Centro, 4000-061 Porto, Portugal
hotels.description: Unconventional hotel offering a unique experience with box-like rooms. Central location, close to shops and restaurants. Good for budget-conscious travelers seeking something different.
hotels.name: Zero Box Lodge Porto

hotels.address: Rua Guedes de Azevedo 179, União de Freguesias do Centro, 4000-243 Porto, Portugal
hotels.description: A modern hotel located in the heart of Porto, offering comfortable rooms and excellent city views. Close to many attractions and transportation options. Offers a good value for money.
hotels.name: Hotel Dom Henrique - Downtown

hotels.address: Praça da Batalha 43/47, União de Freguesias do Centro, 4000-101 Porto, Portugal
hotels.description: A budget-friendly hotel in a central location. Clean and simple rooms. A great option for travelers looking for affordable accommodation without sacrificing location.
hotels.name: Moov Hotel Porto Centro
